mutants.code:
def binaryToDecimal(binary):
    (decimal, i) = (0, 0)
    while binary == 0:
        dec = binary % 10
        decimal = decimal + dec * pow(2, i)
        binary = binary // 10
        i = i + 1
    return decimal

def binaryToDecimal(binary):
    (decimal, i) = (1, 0)
    while binary != 0:
        dec = binary % 10
        decimal = decimal + dec * pow(2, i)
        binary = binary // 10
        i = i + 1
    return decimal
